LanguageData.ToxicFallout.label: toxic fallout
LanguageData.ToxicFallout.letterText:
A distant chemical fire has released a plume of poison over this entire region.

Any person or creature not under a roof will be slowly sickened by the toxic dust settling out of the atmosphere.

It will last for anywhere between a few days to over a season.
LanguageData.VolcanicWinter.label: volcanic winter
LanguageData.VolcanicWinter.letterText: A distant supervolcano has erupted and begun spewing millions of cubic kilometers of ash into the atmosphere.\n\nAsh in the atmosphere will obscure the sun. Temperatures will drop and plants will suffer for lack of sunlight. It could pass in a few weeks, or it might last many quadrums.
LanguageData.HeatWave.label: heat wave
LanguageData.HeatWave.letterText: An unusual heat wave has begun.\n\nHeat waves can kill quickly if people start getting heatstroke. Stay cool by building a cooler or getting deep under a mountain.
LanguageData.ColdSnap.label: cold snap
LanguageData.ColdSnap.letterText: An unusual cold snap has set in.\n\nCold snaps can quickly kill by hypothermia. Be sure to build a heated space to survive, wear appropriate apparel, and try to harvest crops before they freeze and die.
LanguageData.Flashstorm.label: flashstorm
LanguageData.Flashstorm.letterText: A freak localized flashstorm is striking a small area with lightning. This can cause massive fires.
